features: COMPACT & POWERFUL - The 6 inch Hurricane Classic Clip Fan is portable comfort that easily mounts wherever it's needed to provide quality air flow with reliable performance, ideal for homes, offices, school, work stations, gyms greenhouses and living spaces.

CLIP IT ANYWHERE - The versatile mounting position puts the fan wherever it’s needed; fan features an adjustable tilt mechanism that changes the fan’s positioning and direction. The clip stays secure to any surface you need, including desks, tables, high chairs, industrial areas, commercial work stations, cubicles and more.
2 SPEED SETTINGS - The quiet, powerful motor allows you to adjust for optimal airflow and comfort in two choice of modes; runs at a comfortable 306 CFM and fast cooling 2350 RPM on high.
DURABLE & CORDED - Features a metal fan grill and strong steel neck support; mounting bracket and 5-foot 120 volt power cord included; measures 7.9 L x 7.7 W x 11.9 H inches
SAFETY CERTIFIED - This fan is ETL certified for safety, the ETL listing is a mark of the industry’s safety and quality standards in North America.
body.description: For a refreshing breeze and controlled airflow wherever you need it, look no further than the Hurricane Classic 6-Inch Table Clip Fan, suitable for any indoor surface. Its compact size allows it to snugly fit into tight spaces while still delivering powerful ventilation, featuring 2 adjustable speeds and a tilt mechanism for personalized airflow. With a high-speed setting, this clip-on fan operates at 306 CFM and 2350 RPM, ensuring efficient cooling. The sturdy spring clamp securely holds the fan in place during use, providing peace of mind against unexpected slips or falls, especially when mounted high on shelves or table surfaces. Its convenient 5-foot power cord offers flexibility in fan placement, making it great for various environments such as grow tents, apartments, offices, studios, cubicles, and dormitories. Despite its powerful motor, the fan operates quietly, without any distracting buzzing or humming, thanks to its quality construction featuring a metal fan grill and steel neck support. Designed for reliability and durability, the Hurricane 6-Inch Table Clip Fan ensures consistent performance in both small and large areas. Compact yet robust, this fan offers convenient portability, secure mounting, and refreshing airflow whenever needed, making it an essential addition to any space seeking comfort and ventilation.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Features & Benefits Adjustable Tilt & Fan Direction The Hurricane Classic 6-inch Clip Fan allows you to easily change the fan’s position to allow for direct or indirect airflow. Quick & Easy Mounting Strong, versatile clamping system allows you to use this fan in different areas of your home. The 2" clamp opening is perfect for desks, tables, nightstands, indoor gardening and grow tents. 2 Quiet Speeds Set and control your fan speed for optimal air flow and comfort. The quiet, yet powerful motor creates a cooling breeze on either Low or High speed.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Great fan for a great price. Runs extremely quite, moves lots of air. And high quality build. Over sized motor and all metal oscillation components. I am very impressed with this fan.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cool and space saver
reviews.reviewText: I purchased one of these fans 3 or 4 years ago. My son and daughter kept taking it. I surprised them both with there on fan. This fan is quiet and packs a punch. Saves floor space. No loud noise. Works consistently keep air circulating.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars It's a fan
reviews.reviewText: Honestly, my only gripe is I purchased this fan to add some airflow, and I ended up buying the exact same fan I've had for about 5 years, and it cost me about 5x the price of the old one. I dont understand how a rebranding company can charge so much without adding anything to the fan to make it better, or even different.Ranting aside, good fan. Quiet and decent airflow. If you can find one cheaper that looks the same, get that one. They are all the same.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 23, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Pure power fan
reviews.reviewText: So I'm writing this review early to inform anyone who had been searching fan after fan as I have for awhile now. Normally I wait about a month to write a review to get good usage out of an item but it's only been a few days since for this Hurricane fan. I recently purchased a small Vornado that claimed 50 ft for less than $40 and thought perfect just what I need. Nope. Other than the highest setting every setting below that is very weak, Laughably so. The lowest doesn't seem to really do anything. The high is okay but 50 ft is more like 5-10ft. This Hurricane 16" fan was cheaper than its"12 fan for some reason and a few dollars cheaper than the Vornado and the quality is a night and day difference. It feels as if the lowest setting on this fan is faster than the Vornado highest setting. (Vornado Duo Small tower). I did read reviews that say the taller tower is better but I didn't wanna spend double the price. I'm so happy I bought this 16 inch fan that I purchased another yesterday because I couldn't believe how much air it pushed out. It was pushing more than my Honeywells which I have quite a few different ones from the table top, air movers (Vornado competitors) and large stand. I had a box that fit the fan perfectly so I didn't hang it and it would stay straight so that I could use it next to the portable AC to push air across a room. Again, made a night and day difference compared to every fan I had and mentioned. I bought this specific one because the CFM was higher than Hurricanes other fans (with stands) and many other fans I looked at in general. I was looking for power more than actual convenience or care for noise level as it is hot in the Deep South. On a side note, this fan is very heavy and the instructions basically show one picture of how to put it together but it must've taken me a minute or two to do it. It's pretty easy and a bit of common sense once you look at it, it's the heaviness that may be more of an issue which is why I was glad I happened to have a box that was capable of actually holding it without moving. I didn't need the Oscillating feature for the first one, just a straight shot. And as I said fan noise wasn't a concern as long as it pushed air and this fan, at least for me wasn't that loud. It's as loud as you might think a strong fan would be but since it's across the room and I have many other fans plus the portable AC it's not an issue whatsoever.I can't recommend this fan enough, if it's power you're after and at an amazing price then this is it.Highly recommended!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The fans are small but they work great
reviews.reviewText: I bought 2 of these for each person renting out bedrooms in our home. No matter what you do, it gets hot in those spare rooms. These work great because they hang on the wall so they don't take up space in the already small bedrooms. They are very happy with the extra coolness in the room and the sound is light enough to not keep them up.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Fan really puts out some air. Easy to mount to wall. Well worth the money.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars It’s great while it lasts!!
reviews.reviewText: This is the second one I have purchased and should have learned the first time around. I love it when its working but its life is short… this one made it over a year so YAY for that however I did purchase a different replacement this time. So in short, works great if you only need it for a short time otherwise I’d recommend choosing a better quality fan.
5 minutes from opening the box to mounting on the wallquiet, easy to assemble and lots of air movement
Excelente, poco ruido, alta potencia para el tamaño.

The original fan I ordered came with a broken speed selector. After installing the new fan, and really taking a good look at the whole fan, the speed selector switch is definitely the weak point. I opened up the small panel that houses the electronics, and the selector switch is just a piece of plastic attached to another piece of plastic that goes into a small hole in the control board. If it was metal, I wouldn't have had a problem with the first fan. Overall this fan is easy to install, moves air very well and is about as loud as your average cheap oscillating fan. The all metal body and metal fans are very nice. Fan oscillates well. I really wish the selector lever was all metal too! This fan is heavy duty except for that part... and the selector switch is something the end user will manipulate every time its used. Company sent a replacement fan immediately, so I can't be too upset. Once you get the wall plate on, swapping fans is trivial.

reviews.reviewTitle: great fan that moves air. get it.
reviews.reviewText: easy to assemble.this is the best fan. are you growing?buy this fan. anything over a 2 x 4 tent needs this much air moving around. kiss wpm goodbye after using this fan with proper extraction. low setting is like a 'hurricane'. seriously, if your flower/veg tent is packed, get this fan. i used 1x2s with 45' end cut to accomodate the post, with 3 perpendicular pieces to stop it from pushing throught the tent. 5 minute job with the right tools.get this fan. it moves air.Edit 17/11/22.. the fan is still running. I've cleaned it a few times. It works as good as new.
